name: Copyright-Friendly Fighting Ship Game
description: This is my first personal project I made in Java after taking a few months of AP Computer Science A. After completing an assignment in which I had to create a Point class whose objects could be assigned coordinates, I realized I could use this concept to make a simplified version of a certain popular strategy game that will remain unnamed for my legal safety. This game is pretty simple, but I learned a lot from making it and I am proud of how it turned out. Enjoy!
